|cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A35 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63EFR-BDC; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 2E:B1:95 |oui = 00:E0:4C |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.143-23;Debian 9; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0,Micro SD Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = |pwr_poe_amp = |pwr_conn = USB Type C |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000,8,N,1),, via 26-pin header, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Bluetooth 4.2, I2S, I2C, SPI, GPIO, |addchip = 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8089;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8088;;3;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = rock |defaultpass = rock |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, Slackware |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 07/2019 |estprice = 15.99 |upc = 4038816091031 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723DS; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3308 Quad-core Cortex-A35 *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot *WiFi & BT: [[Realtek]] RTL8723DS Bluetooth 4.2 *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet w/ Optional PoE *USB: 1 USB 2.0 *GPIO: 2x 26-pin Headers *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C ==Links of Interest== *The [https://wiki.radxa.com/ROCKPI_S_PoE_HAT RockPi S PoE HAT] (or a similar product) is required for PoE support. *[http://linuxgizmos.com/radxa-updates-rock-pi-4-with-nvme-and-debuts-poe-hat-and-a-tiny-rk3308-based-voice-board/ ''Radxa a tiny RK3308-based voice board'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2019/10/rock-pi-s-is-a-1-7-inch-square-quad-core-computer-priced-at-10-and-up.html ''Rock Pi S is a 1.7 inch square, quad-core computer'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/06/19/rock-pi-s-tiny-sbc-rockchip-rk3308-processor/ ''$9.9 ROCK Pi S is a Tiny SBC Powered by Rockchip RK3308 Processor'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/radxa/radxa_rock_pi_s |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = rockchip |subtarget = armv8 |arch = aarch64_generic |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = PoE suported with optional hat
Optional Realtek RTL8723DS
WLAN is optional along with BT 4.0 BLE
Optional DDR3 RAM: 256MB / 512MB, optional eMMC: 0GB / 4GB / 8GB }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
